titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5193) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction to certain taxpayers for elementary and secondary education expenses.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-654, by Mr. Reynolds.
The amendment recommended by the Committee on Ways and Means now printed in the bill shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 210.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 521.
DEBATE - The House continued with debate on H. Res. 521.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 208 - 201 (Roll no. 387).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/11/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 5193 (back to school tax relief).
